description: This file contains shell script functions and logic for managing bundle metadata, fetching installed bundle lists, and handling file paths within a device-specific environment, likely used for device configuration or firmware management.

methods.name: log
methods.description: Logs messages by appending to the log file specified in $XCONF_LOG_FILE.

methods.name: getPkgMetadata
methods.description: Retrieves package metadata using jsonquery; logs failure if unable to fetch data.

methods.name: getInstalledBundleList
methods.description: Returns a list of installed bundle name and version pairs, searching specific directories and handling metadata files.
